48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Sa`eed [may Allah be pleased with him] narrated that:When the Prophet (ﷺ) used to eat or drink, he would say: “All praise is due to Allah who fed us and gave us drink, and made us Muslims (Al-ḥamdulillāh, alladhī aṭ`amanā, wa saqānā, wa ja`alanā muslimīn).”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقُولُ إِذَا فَرَغَ مِنَ الطَّعَامِ
chapter.eng-name: What One Says After Finishing Food
